It's great

If Mac won't let you push from within Rstudio
Go into Mac terminal and enter:
git credential-osxkeychain erase

and this should erase any set passwords and now the push should ask you for username and PAT.

Also see https://medium.com/@haroldfinch01/how-do-i-update-the-password-for-git-d1f2d66af48e for tips on other OSes
